Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Cranial Nerve Diseases/Ocular Motility Disorders/Tolosa-Hunt Syndrome
Record.Description: An idiopathic syndrome characterized by the formation of granulation tissue in the anterior cavernous sinus or superior orbital fissure, producing a painful ophthalmoplegia. (Adams et al., Principles of Neurology, 6th ed, p271)
